backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, challenge sessions, ICP transactions, visitor tracking, and query methods with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration utility converting old actor state to new format by adding a visitorCounts map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling identity, backend actor initialization, error states, routing, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing © notice and caffeine.ai attribution with icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation buttons, user info, and admin controls based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal for creating a user profile, handling first-user admin assignment and form submission.
frontend/src/components/SendICPPrizeModa: Provides a modal for admins to send ICP prizes, including balance display, validation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/SetAppPrincipalM: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/config/appIdentity.ts: Resolves the backend canister ID from environment variables and derives its account identifier.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, and logout via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs for profiles, sessions, leaderboard, competition state, and ICP transfers.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for dark and light themes with global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/accountId.ts: Implements ICP account identifier generation using SHA-224, CRC32, and principal-to-hex conversion utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface for managing competition state, viewing users, metrics, and transaction history with pagination and modals.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a sorted global leaderboard with rank icons and a return button.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Landing page that tracks visitors, shows features and top leaderboard entries, and initiates Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenu.tsx: Main navigation menu offering entry points to challenge, stats, wallet, and leaderboard pages.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Displays user typing stats and challenge history, computing totals and averages from fetched sessions.
frontend/src/pages/TypingChallenge.tsx: Implements a multi‑level typing challenge with progress tracking, metrics calculation, and session saving.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows user ICP wallet info with placeholder balance and a disabled withdrawal workflow.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines shared frontend types including the UserProfile interface.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/visitorId.ts: Generates an anonymized visitor ID by hashing the user's IP address with a fallback value.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and extended utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the current deployed app baseline, requested fixes, and new features including word-count correction, Top Players top-3 toggle, visitor analytics, and paginated Admin Users section. Also notes architectural constraints and a prior failed deployment attempt.
